samples.question: Okay, so is there any difference in the weather patterns in different parts of Vietnam?
samples.transcript: I would say yes Vietnam contains like three main parts as I think the western the northern the southern and the middle of Vietnam And each like part has its own unique features of weather For the north side we have like two main features it is scorching hot and sometimes the weather is raining a lot But for the southern part the weather is mostly like very hot at that time but in the middle of Vietnam there were many like disastrous things in there Okay great, well done.
